# namespacify

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of namespacify is to automate the addition of namespace prefixes (e.g. "dplyr::") to code
to facilitate converting scripts to packages.

## Installation

You can install the development version of namespacify like so:

``` r

```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(namespacify)
## basic example code
```
